channel.title: Improvisation Chamber Ensemble
channel.description:
A series of performances by Wayne State University Improvisation Chamber Ensemble, which was organized in 1966 by Dr. Ruth Shaw Wylie, as an experiment in teaching contemporary techniques to advanced composition students.,Series of performances by Wayne State U. Improvisation Chamber Ensemble, which was organized in 1966 by Dr. Ruth Shaw Wylie, as an experiment in teaching contemporary techniques to advanced composition students. Refer also to blue spiral book under 67-29.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Program 6
item.description: This program features live improvisational music, as well as a spoken introduction by Ruth Shaw Wylie.
item.dc:creator: Wayne State University
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
